title: Classic Tomato Pasta
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook the pasta according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add diced tomatoes with their juices and season with salt and pepper.
Simmer the tomato sauce for 10-12 minutes until slightly thickened.
Drain the pasta and toss with the tomato sauce.
Serve hot with grated parmesan cheese on top.

title: Scrambled Eggs with Toast
steps: Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk together with milk, salt, and pepper.
Heat butter in a non-stick skillet over medium-low heat.
Pour in the egg mixture and let sit for 20 seconds.
Gently stir the eggs with a spatula, creating soft curds.
Remove from heat when eggs are still slightly wet, as they will continue cooking.
Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Serve eggs on toast and enjoy immediately.

title: Chicken and Rice Bowl
steps: Season chicken breast with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until golden and cooked through.
Remove chicken and let rest for 5 minutes, then slice.
Meanwhile, cook rice according to package instructions.
In the same skillet, saut√© broccoli florets for 3-4 minutes.
Assemble bowls with rice, sliced chicken, and broccoli.
Drizzle with soy sauce and serve.
